stages.prompt:
There has been an electrical shortage in the jump drive. You have been re-routed to planet XADSA768A and we have ejected the landing pod. 
 START AUTOPILOT FOR ASSISTANCE
stages.failure: You did a boo-boo. But that's OK, give it another try.

stages.prompt:
Booting auto pilot systems...


CRITICAL FAILURE. 
Engage manual override.
stages.failure: Retrying to boot. Still FAILING. Try again!

stages.prompt: Distance to planet critical. Deploy heat shields!
stages.instruction: Turn on {0}, {7}, {9} and {1} then EXECUTE between altitude of 200 and 150 units.
